name: A Vampire in New York [Demo]
description:
Controls:

Esc: Bring up Controls/Resume Game

WASD: Movement

E: Interact/Progress Dialogue

Space: Speed up Dialogue

Mouse Click: Select Dialogue Options

You're a vampire who's overslept quite a bit only to find yourself awake and hungry in the big city of New York! With the guidance of your vampire companion try to get a meal in before the sun rises.

Made by:

Isaac LaRussa: Original Concept/2D Art/ Dialogue/Textures

Hadley Richardson-O'Brien: Programming/3D Models/ Chevalier Dialogue/ Art assistance

Zucchini: Music

Made for Scream Jam 2021!

We loved the idea for this game so much when we made it for the jam that we now have plans to make it into a full game! We hope to add a lot more characters to interact with, a map with more areas, and a lot more things to do in the future!
